ing: 1 bunch fresh dill tied with kitchen twine
des: "This poached salmon is a family favorite and its easy to do. I suggest serving rice and a veggie with this meal."
ins: Place the salmon fillets in a large pot, and pour in the chicken stock. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and place dill in the pot. Cover, and cook 15 minutes, or until fish is easily flaked with a fork.
